lista_canton <- c("Todas", lista_canton)

h2("Cantones")
selectInput(
  inputId = "canton",
  label = "Cantón",
  choices = lista_canton,
  selected = "Todas"
)

# DISTRITOS
lista_distrito <- unique(cuadrantes$distrito)
lista_distrito <- sort(lista_distrito)
lista_distrito <- c("Todas", lista_distrito)

h2("Distrito")
selectInput(
  inputId = "distrito",
  label = "Distritos",
  choices = lista_distrito,
  selected = "Todas"
)


filtrarRegistros <-  reactive({
  cuadrantes_f <-
    cuadrantes  %>%
    dplyr::select(area_m2, aprob, canton, distrito, nomb_zona)
  
  cuadrantes_f <-
    cuadrantes_f  %>%
    
    
    filter 
  if (input$aprob != "Todas") {
    cuadrantes_f <-
      cuadrantes_f %>%
      filter(aprob == input$aprob)
  }

     
  if (input$canton != "Todas") {
    cuadrantes_f <-
      cuadrantes_f %>%
      filter(canton == input$canton)
  }
  

  if (input$distrito != "Todas") {
    cuadrantes_f <-
      cuadrantes_f %>%
      filter(distrito == input$distrito)
  }
  
  return(cuadrantes_f)
})

### Visor

```{r}


colores <- c("#4DAF4A" , "#B2FFFC", "#FFFF33")
c_zona <- levels(as.factor(cuadrantes$nomb_zona))
paleta <- colorFactor(palette = colores, domain = c_zona)

icon_1 <- makeAwesomeIcon(
  icon = "graduation-cap",
  iconColor = "#87CEEB",
  markerColor = "blue",
  library = "fa"
)

icon_2 <- makeAwesomeIcon(
  icon = "location-arrow",
  iconColor = "#00FF7F",
  markerColor = "#713d35",
  library = "fa"
)

icon_3 <- iconList(
  escuela = makeIcon("https://github.com/marcelocubero/capas_TFG/blob/main/school-solid.svg", 18 , 18),
  colegio = makeIcon("https://github.com/marcelocubero/capas_TFG/blob/main/school-flag-solid.svg" , 18 , 18)
)









renderLeaflet({
  registros <-
    filtrarRegistros()
  
  mep_c <- mep [registros, , op = st_within]
  localidades_c <- localidades [registros, , op = st_within]
  cantones_c <- cantones [registros, , op = st_intersects]
  
  
  
  
  
  leaflet() %>%
    addTiles(group = "OSM") %>%
    addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.NatGeoWorldMap , group = "NatGeo") %>%
    addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.DarkMatter, group = "CartoDB-Black") %>%
    addProviderTiles("Esri.WorldImagery", group = "ESRI") %>%
    
    
    addPolygons(
      data = registros,
      color = ~ paleta(nomb_zona),
      fillOpacity = 1,
      weight = 1,
      opacity = 1,
      stroke = TRUE,
      group = "Cuadrantes",
      popup = paste0("<strong> Cuadrante: <strong/>",
                     registros$poblado)
    ) %>%
    
    addLegend(
      pal = paleta,
      values = registros$nomb_zona,
      opacity = 1,
      title = "Zona"
    ) %>%
    
    
    addAwesomeMarkers(
      data = mep_c,
      icon = icon_1,
      popup = paste0(mep_c$Nivel,
                     ":<br>",
                     mep_c$Nombre),
      group = "Centros Educativos"
    ) %>%
    
    addAwesomeMarkers(
      data = localidades_c,
      icon = icon_2,
      popup = paste0(localidades_c$nombre),
      group = "Localidades"
    ) %>%
    
    
    
    addPolygons(
      data = cantones_c,
      color = "#00008B",
      fillOpacity = 0,
      weight = 1,
      opacity = 1,
      stroke = TRUE,
      group = "Cantones",
      popup = paste0("<strong> Cantón: <strong/>",
                     cantones_c$canton)
    ) %>%
    
    
    addLayersControl(
      "bottomleft",
      baseGroups = c("OSM", "NatGeo", "CartoDB-Black", "ESRI"),
      overlayGroups = c(
        "Cantones" ,
        "Cuadrantes" ,
        "Centros Educativos" ,
        "Localidades"
      ),
      options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = TRUE)
    ) %>%
    addScaleBar("bottomright") %>%
    addMiniMap() %>%
    addResetMapButton() %>%
    addFullscreenControl() %>%
    addControlGPS() %>%
    addSearchOSM() %>%
    addMouseCoordinates() 
  
})
```

renderDT({

})
